name: Deques
description:
Create your own quartet or domino cards to play and learn.

Choose from different basic templates or create your own templates with different card properties.

The following card properties are available:
- Title
- Quartet title with automatic A1-Z4 display
- Picture or emoji with variable height
- Text
- Rating (eg 5 emoji stars)
- Numeric value + unit
- Yes-No-value from one emoji each (eg emoji thumbs up, thumbs down)
- Variants with Label + Text, Rating, Numeric value or Yes-No value

Add individual cards to your deck or edit them.
Adjust the template of your deck later for all cards.

Export and Import Decks.
Share single cards.

Play and test your quartet game or image domino against a virtual opponent.

Print and craft your own real playing cards to play against friends and family.
